name: Klurby
description:
A game where you transform into your enemies to solve puzzles that need their abilities!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - Attack

E - Transform/Untransform

M - Mute/Unmute Music

ESC - Quit game

Credits:

Roger Volek Shelton - Programming/Art

Lars-Kristian Svenoey - Programming/3D Modeling
